pages.text: $(l:https://github.com/Mowmaster/Pedestals/wiki/Harvester)Wiki Link/$ $(br)The harvester upgrade will check any grown crops on the radius of the top side from the pedestal then it will harvest those grown crops randomly.

pages.title: Notes
pages.text: $(li)The upgrade can be enchanted with pedestal range and pedestal speed enchantment to increase it's range and speed respectively$(li)The harvester can be equipped with hoe for utilizing it's enchant, the hoe won't take durability damage when it's in the pedestal$(li)The pedestal will use the tool enchantment if it's equipped with hoe otherwise it will use the upgrade enchantment
